summary: The Necromage perk will no longer buff magic cast on player vampires. Not needed if you use the latest Unofficial Patch.
descriptionHtml:
[b][[url=https://jmrooker.wordpress.com/2016/06/19/a-message-to-my-mod-users-console-gamers-and-mod-makers/]Important Message To My Mod Users, Console Gamers and Mod Makers[/url]] [/b]

The Necromage perk will no longer buff magic cast on player vampires. Not needed if you use the latest Unofficial Skyrim Patch, as it already makes this change.

[url=http://forums.nexusmods.com/index.php?/topic/890670-necromage-vampire-exploit-fix/]Created by request[/url].
author: Rooker
